channel.title: Suggestions Help REP++
channel.description:
Okay so I'm building my Hunter Skill from scratch for my [b][PI][/b] server and I want to get the best experience out of it so you don't just get 99 Hunter super fast. I want it to be slow/fast at the same time...but here's the level requirements that I got so far... [center][b]IMPLING NPC'S[/b][/center] [ul][li]Baby Impling 1 Hunter Requirement[/li] [li]Young Impling 17 Hunter Requirement[/li] [li]Gourment Impling 28 Hunter Requirement[/li] [li]Earth Impling 36 Hunter Requirement[/li] [li]Essence Impling 42 Hunter Requirement[/li] [li]Electic Impling 50 Hunter Requirement[/li] [li]Nature Impling 58 Hunter Requirement[/li] [li]Magpie Impling 65 Hunter Requirement[/li] [li]Ninja Impling 74 Hunter Requirement[/li] [li]Dragon Impling 83 Hunter Requirement[/li][/ul] [center][b]BUTTERFLY NPC'S[/b][/center] [ul][li]Ruby Harvest 15 Hunter Requirement[/li] [li]Sapphire Glacialis 25 Hunter Requirement[/li] [li]Snowy Knight 35 Hunter Requirement[/li] [li]Black Warlock 45 Hunter Requirement[/li][/ul] [center][b]OTHER NPC'S[/b][/center] [center][u]Well so far...[/u][/center] [ul][li]Rabbit (Rabbit Hole) 50 Hunter Requirement [/li][/ul] [center][b]Okay so here is what I need help with :D[/b][/center]
[b]Do you guys have any other NPC'S that I should add for my[/b] Hunter Skill[b]/[/b]Suggestions[b]/[/b]or XP Rates[b]?[/b]
Remember...I do [size=12pt]Rep+[/size]

item.title: Suggestions Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

laakerules:

Oh well, if you add normal chimps. id say make it like 750 or so a catch. and make them have a respawn time of around 15 seconds or so. and for reds do 1250 per catch and 20 seconds per respawn. thats what i used on my old server!

Great idea thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestions Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Okay so I’m building my Hunter Skill from scratch for my [PI] server and I want to get the best experience out of it so you don’t just get 99 Hunter super fast. I want it to be slow/fast at the same time…but here’s the level requirements that I got so far…
[center]IMPLING NPC’S[/center]

[ul][li]Baby Impling 1 Hunter Requirement[/li]
[li]Young Impling 17 Hunter Requirement[/li]
[li]Gourment Impling 28 Hunter Requirement[/li]
[li]Earth Impling 36 Hunter Requirement[/li]
[li]Essence Impling 42 Hunter Requirement[/li]
[li]Electic Impling 50 Hunter Requirement[/li]
[li]Nature Impling 58 Hunter Requirement[/li]
[li]Magpie Impling 65 Hunter Requirement[/li]
[li]Ninja Impling 74 Hunter Requirement[/li]
[li]Dragon Impling 83 Hunter Requirement[/li][/ul]

[center]BUTTERFLY NPC’S[/center]

[ul][li]Ruby Harvest 15 Hunter Requirement[/li]
[li]Sapphire Glacialis 25 Hunter Requirement[/li]
[li]Snowy Knight 35 Hunter Requirement[/li]
[li]Black Warlock 45 Hunter Requirement[/li][/ul]

[center]OTHER NPC’S[/center]
[center]Well so far…[/center]

[ul][li]Rabbit (Rabbit Hole) 50 Hunter Requirement [/li][/ul]

[center]Okay so here is what I need help with [/center]

[b]Do you guys have any other NPC'S that I should add for my[/b] Hunter Skill[b]/[/b]Suggestions[b]/[/b]or XP Rates[b]?[/b]

Remember…I do [size=12pt]Rep+[/size]

Read full topic
